## DEFAULT\_OPTIONS variable

Default options for the plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
DEFAULT_OPTIONS: {
    allowDeprecatedDirectives: boolean;
    directives: any;
    globPatterns: string[];
    globPatternsDetach: never[];
    excludePatterns: never[];
    includePatterns: string[];
    jsonRecap: boolean;
    reportOnly: boolean;
}
```
